1052320.name: Fantasy Grounds - Meanders Token Pack (Token Pack)
1052320.description:
Meanders Token Pack

This Initial FG Meanders Token Pack is the first of many planned. It features over 150 pre-sized tokens in a convenient module with a wide range of assets to suit fantasy games and in particular the Meanders Map series - allowing those who use them art assets that match.
This set is designed as a starter set with a lot of different stuff and includes:
  • Barrels
  • Crates
  • Chests
  • Doors
  • Grates
  • Houses
  • Traps
  • Beds
  • Campfires
  • Bucket
  • Stone
  • Brazier
  • Potion
  • Throne
  • Chair
  • Forge
  • Market
  • Bookshelves
  • Tables
  • Jugs
  • Tombs
  • Graves
  • Stairs
  • Rowboats
  • Tents
  • a Torture Rack
  • Bridge
  • Mine Cart
  • Scroll
  • Books
  • Gas
  • Rags
  • Jars
  • Log
  • Rope Coil
  • Haystack
  • Skull Pillar
Note:
Custom FG Battle Maps on which tokens are illustrated not included
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by:
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
